definitions.definition: a small rectangular block typically made of fired or sun-dried clay, used in building.
examples: block, cinder block, firebrick, adobe, clinker bricks and mortar

definitions.definition: bricks collectively as a building material.
examples: this mill was built of brick

definitions.definition: a large and relatively heavy cellular phone, typically an early model with limited functionality.
examples: I had one of those Motorola bricks as my first cell phone

definitions.definition: a smartphone or other electronic device that has completely ceased to function.
examples: while updating the firmware the USB cable got disconnected and the phone is now a brick

definitions.definition: a generous, helpful, and reliable person.
block or enclose with a wall of bricks.
examples: the doors have been bricked up

definitions.definition: cause (a smartphone or other electronic device) to become completely unable to function, typically on a permanent basis.
examples: installing an unofficial OS voids the warranty and may brick the phone
